about.title: Why Insepio?
about.p1: We are a young company that aims to ease the travel planning process and make the client feel in charge.
about.p2: Immerse yourself in an authentic experience where you won't feel like just another face in the crowd.
about.p3: Engage with the local community and immerse yourself in their unique culture, traditions, and way of life.
about.p4: Explore and experience more while spending less.

contact.p1: You are not sure how to plan, what to do or just want to ask for an advice.
contact.p2: Follow our social media channels for the latest updates & news.
